name: Bootcamp
description:
Welcome to Bootcamp! With the help of our intense training system you'll be combat ready in no time. Step right in the arena and dodge the (hopefully) non-lethal laser cannons until you drop from exhaustion. And then jump right back in!, because you can do better than that.

Master the timings, test your reflexes, dance in the face of danger and surpass your high score for bragging rights!

Features
  • Use the arrow keys to move, or configure your own.
  • Grab crosses to increase your score.
  • Original soundtrack described as "very nice dear" by my mom.
  • Easy to pick up, not too hard to master.
  • Around 20 minutes of game play.
  • Available in Spanish and Japanese, new translations may happen if there's interest.
  • Lots of dodging.
